data.title: Maharashtra tops in attracting highest FDI worth Rs 70,795 crore in Q1FY25
data.description: The neighbouring Karnataka ranked second by attracting investment worth Rs 19,059 crore, Delhi third with Rs 10,788 crore, Telangana fourth with Rs 9,023 crore, Gujarat fifth with Rs 8,508 crore, Tamil Nadu sixth with Rs 5,818 crore, Uttar Pradesh eighth with Rs 370 crore and Rajasthan ninth with Rs 311 crore.

data.title: China’s Wealthy Increasingly Seek Overseas Business Investments Amid Domestic Slowdown
data.description: China’s affluent individuals are increasingly shifting focus toward overseas business investments, seeking opportunities beyond the mainland as domestic economic growth slows. Asset managers and consultants note that this trend is no longer solely about investment returns but is now driven by a desire to expand businesses globally.  Ryota Kadogaki, co-founder and global CEO of Monolith, […]The post China’s Wealthy Increasingly Seek Overseas Business Investments Amid Domestic Slowdown appeared first on Insights Success.

data.title: LIVE | AEX licht lager van start, alle ogen op het banenrapport
data.description: De AEX is in het lichtrood geopend. Beleggers zijn geschrokken van een tegenvallend banencijfer uit de VS, wat een voorbode kan zijn voor het banenrapport dat vanmiddag naar buiten komt. Het banenrapport is van cruciaal belang aangezien de Fed deze maand besluit hoeveel de rentetarieven verlaagd zullen worden.

data.title: En Irak, le palmier-dattier icône nationale résiste vaillamment à la sécheresse
data.description: Pieds nus sur le tronc rêche d'un palmier, le dos calé dans un harnais en métal et en tissu, Ali Abed entame l'escalade pour couper des régimes de dattes. En Irak, l'arbre véritable icône nationale tente vaillamment de résister à la sécheresse.

data.title: Fitment committee defers decision on GST compliance for foreign shipping lines
data.description: Director General of GST Intelligence claims that foreign shipping lines are liable to pay GST for services received from their head offices based outside India, including expenses related to vessel leases, repairs, and other maintenance activities conducted overseas.
